site_name: 90 Hectares Of Land Lying Between Botany Bay (south) And The M25 (north).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 23/03142/RE4: construction environmental management plan (3), details of flood risk assessment(5), desk based assessment (12), materials report (14), drainage surveys (15), arboricultural method statement (18), hedgerow survey and planting (21) and landscape and ecological management (22) in respect of enhancement measures designed principally to provide hydrology and biodiversity betterment, including topographical amelioration, surface water management proposals and habitat creation. The site is to remain in its existing use.
